alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; DeWitt; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 13 at 7:09AM CDT until May 13 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR SOUTHEASTERN BASTROP, SOUTHEASTERN CALDWELL, DEWITT, SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE, GONZALES, SOUTHEASTERN GUADALUPE, KARNES, WESTERN LAVACA AND WILSON COUNTIES... At 709 AM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Cuero, Gonzales, Floresville, Yoakum, Luling, Kenedy, Karnes City, Poth, Yorktown, Shiner, Stockdale, Flatonia, Moulton, Kosciusko, Nixon, Elmendorf, La Vernia, Waelder, Runge and Falls City. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

area.areaDesc: Bastrop; Caldwell; DeWitt; Fayette; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Lavaca; Wilson
